Html:
hello, 

Will you provide some examples on how to add multiple layers (markers, ploygon..) on the WPF version of Gmap.net

In window form version , there are GMapOverlay, GMapRoute. is there an same class in WPF version? if not, is there an plan to

to update the WPF version to include

GMapOverlay, GMapRoute as in windowform version

 

Great work

Max
in current  wpf version everything is a marker, check the demos for more detail

hello, Radioman

thank you for that. My program will build thousands markers on the map. the program becoming rather sluggish. any suggestions how to make it more responsive with large amount of markers?

I have both wpf and window form version. prefer the answer for wpf version

thanks

Max

wpf version can hande ~500 markers in good permormace if you use lightweight visuals as FrameworkElement

since my markers spread over a large area, is it possible dynamically enable and disable markers according to if they are visible in the viewing area.

if it's possible, how to do that, some example will be greatly appreciated.

thanks

Max
